content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I'm open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your budget and what are you looking to pay per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 800 Euros per month. I have to pay for utilities, so I want to negotiate the best possible rental price for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would suggest a rental price of 900 Euros per month. This price takes into account the cost of utilities and allows for a reasonable profit margin for me as the landlord. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, that's within my budget. I agree to the price of 900 Euros per month. TERMINATE.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Great, I'm glad we could reach an agreement. The rental price for the apartment will be 900 Euros per month, and you will be responsible for paying for utilities. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns before signing the lease.
name: Heinrich Heine
